title: Increased ping (Patch 6.21 update)
body: Ever since patch 6.21 has been out, every minute my ping will skyline then slowly go back down. It is very annoying and I don't know what to do. Can anyone help me out with this/do you have the same problem? If I need to apply any additional information about my client or computer instruct me what to do and I will happily do it. Thanks! :D

replies.body:
Increases in latency (ping) are usually caused by either local network issues or issues along your route to the server. First, I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it touches on the most frequent configurations that could conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps helped.
Hey guys! I had the exact same problem and I just found a way to fix it last night! If you just flush your DNS it should fix it, at least it did for me.

Can confirm this is a problem for me as well, I kept on dcing during most of my games which led me to get penalized for something that I can't control. And if it helps, when I play Overwatch or WoW I have no ping or lag whatsoever
